items.title: The Next Book Ban Target? Romance: Book Censorship News, August 22, 2025
items.description: Where and how romance books will become the next targets of book banners. That, plus this week's roundup of book censorship news.

items.title: 6 of the Most Controversial Horror Novels in Recent Memory
items.description: These six horror novels stirred up controversy for many reasons, including their body counts and the way they exposed real life scares.

items.title: Paul Tremblay’s Middle Grade Novel is Creepy for Readers of All Ages
items.description: Sometimes middle grade novels are as scary, if not scarier, than adult horror novels.

items.title: Nonfiction Reads by Women in Translation
items.description: What are you reading for Women in Translation Month? Here are some recommendations for nonfiction.

items.title: Florida Shows Concern Over Children’s Access to Beanstack App and More Library Updates
items.description: ALA's latest strategic plan, the latest censorship attacks on Florida libraries, and more library news you can use.
